title: How to restore tabs and groups of tabs
content: I had a ton of saved tabs and groupings of tabs. I closed what I thought was my only open Firefox window then downloaded and installed the most recent Windows update. When I rebooted, I did not realize I had left a Firefox window open with a single tab. That Firefox became my default and I lost all the tabs I had. Is there any way to get those tabs back? The tabs I had yesterday, 1/22/2026 are the ones I need.
creator: pam-raby

title: Ai video
content: Ek baar ki baat hai, ek duniya thi jiska naam tha Gulab Jamun Lok. Wahan zameen gulab jamun ki thi—naram, gol aur halka sa chipchipi. Ped bhi gulab jamun ke the, jin par se chashni tapakti rehti. Aasmaan halka bhura tha, jaise doodh aur cheeni milkar baadal ban gaye hon. Is duniya mein rehne wala ek chhota sa ladka tha—Golu. Golu ko gulab jamun bahut pasand the, par itni mithaas roz-roz usse thoda bore bhi kar deti.
creator: brijmohansardarbrijmohan

title: Why doesn't Firefox fix the problem with the bookmarks toolbar rather than providing instructions that people try to follow.  I have "fixed this" three times and because I am old, I have trouble following even though I have read the instructions.  Thanks
content: I need a more permanent fix to the disappearing bookmarks issue when the file is in use by another entity. I have tried to fix it, read the instructions and when I start to apply the fix, the instructions disappear and now I have to depend on my faulty memory.
creator: brian.mcculloch
